thread.title: 2 juveniles, 1 adult charged in recent car break-ins
thread.title_full: 2 juveniles, 1 adult charged in recent car break-ins

author: Ellen Eldridge
title: 2 juveniles, 1 adult charged in recent car break-ins
text:
Atlanta police arrested three people aged 18 and under in connection with recent break-ins of cars.
Montravius Wilson, 18, and two 14-year-old males were seen breaking out the window of a vehicle on Fountainhead Lane and removing items, Sgt. Warren Pickard said.
MORE:
Police: 800 guns stolen from metro Atlanta cars this year
Prowler caught without pants as Atlanta police chase break-in suspects
The trio ran, Pickard said, but officers chased them down and recovered the stolen items.
Wilson and the teens are charged with entering auto and obstruction. Wilson is also charged with giving a false name to law enforcement.
